title: Money movement mindset
brief_description: Annoying finance bros beware: the comedians are coming for your grindset! Financial planning is a popular podcast and video genre online — but many of them are hosted by young men whose views on how to make bank can be hilariously macho, and based on an unrealistic picture of how and why most people spend their money. In this video, Tiktok comedian Caroline Baniewicz skewers finance bro culture, satirising the impractical ways that these podcasters advise on making your first million.
